>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/lists/{listId}/bookmarks/{bookmarkId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Add the bookmarks to a list

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}

>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes

  label={undefined}

>
